actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the President to award a gold medal on behalf of Congress to the Americans who were held hostage in Lebanon and to the families of the Americans who were killed while being held hostage.

summary.text: Authorizes the President, on behalf of the Congress, to present a gold medal to the Americans who were held hostage in Lebanon and to the families of Americans who were killed while being held hostage there, in recognition of the courage shown and sacrifices made by such Americans and families during such period. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President to award a gold medal on behalf of Congress to the Americans who were held hostage in Lebanon and to the families of the Americans who were killed while being held hostage.
